breathing_background_image_01.paragraph_01: We implement innovative design projects using proprietary furniture solutions that transform properties purchased from the primary market into timeless interiors.
breathing_background_image_01.paragraph_02: Developer Interiors is one of the brands of a dynamically growing startup in the real estate market, which includes: our own Alternative Investment Fund ASI Developer (PLZASI00388).

company_properties_01.text_01: Ready to move in, with a warranty on finishing works
company_properties_01.text_02: Selected corner units on the top floors
company_properties_01.text_03: Purchase on VAT invoice from a professional (with liability insurance)

icons.text: Ready to move in, with warranty/guarantee for finishing works
Selected corner premises on the highest floors
Purchase on a VAT invoice from a professional (with third party liability insurance)

info_01.paragraph: We offer our clients ready-to-move-in premium apartments in the heart of Katowice, featuring timeless and universal design combined with the latest technologies.

info_02.paragraph: The vision of Developer Interiors involves replicating highly refined design elements across a series of similar apartments, which helps maintain price competitiveness.

info_03.paragraph: The warranty covers all finishing works carried out by a professional construction team, as well as furniture installation, lacquered surfaces, iFrame software, and electrical installation for car charging stations.

FAQ.question: WHAT IS INCLUDED IN THE PRICE?
FAQ.answer: The buyer acquires a property free from encumbrances based on a VAT invoice, including a storage room, a share in common areas (such as the SPA area, gym, reception, and patio), and a warranty for all construction, carpentry, and finishing services carried out during the design process.

FAQ.question: IS IT POSSIBLE TO CHARGE AN ELECTRIC CAR?
FAQ.answer: The buyer can purchase an apartment with a parking space in the garage on level 0, equipped with a full-fledged electric car charging station with a power of 22kW.

FAQ.question: WHAT ARE THE FINANCING OPTIONS?
FAQ.answer: The buyer receives an appraisal report for securing a mortgage, allowing for financing the purchase of both the property and its furnishings through a mortgage loan.

FAQ.question: WHEN CAN I MOVE IN?
FAQ.answer: The apartments we offer are fully finished and ready to move in on the day of the notarial deed.

FAQ.question: CAN I PERSONALIZE THE APARTMENT TO MEET MYSELF?
FAQ.answer: Of course, our arrangement and renovation team will, as a priority, help you make any modifications that will make the apartment even better fit your individual needs and expectations.

icons_module_01.header_bottom: Choose a finished apartment on the top floors of Sokolska Towers to be closer to what matters

icons.text: Dressing room, laundry, storage room on the floor

extra_text: This move-in ready apartment combines modernity with timeless elegance.

image_carousel_fader_02.header_bottom: on the 14th floor of Sokolska Towers

texts: Daily commutes can consume on average 330 hours a year. In September 2024, a railway project began that will permanently change the transportation map of the region and redefine the concept of road disruptions in Katowice.

Apartments on the top floors of Sokolska Towers offer the optimal combination of the benefits of city center living, close to the main transportation routes in the region, with the amenities of high-rise construction, providing comfort above the noise.

icons.text: Private parking space with EV charger
Relaxation area with sauna included in fixed charges

texts: Designed with functionality in mind, this apartment offers a wealth of storage space subtly integrated into the furniture layout, complemented by a wardrobe, laundry room, and spacious storage unit right across from the entrance.

plainTexts: - at least that many apartments have been built and will continue to be built in the Katowice Cultural Zone by 2028. The emerging residential areas there are mainly chosen by families with small children.

The primary advantage of Sokolska Towers apartments is their limited number, which will protect the value of your property in the future and also ensure that your view from the window will not be obstructed by further, higher stages of development.
Lower building density also means better transportation comfort, reducing the time needed to leave the estate.

text_plus_single_video_01.header_bottom: in the heart of the city

info.header: Reserve your new home on the 14th floor of Sokolska Towers.
If you plan to finance the purchase through the sale of another property, your apartment will be waiting for you…
Want to move in earlier? Ask for details during the presentation.

Footer_Common.paragraph_1: Wnętrza Deweloperskie is a trademark owned by: Deweloperskie P.S.A. with headquarters in Katowice at Murckowska 14c, NIP: 6343022518, REGON: 525018864 KRS: 0001030478
Footer_Common.paragraph_2: The offer includes luxurious apartments at the prestigious address: ul. Sokolska 30, Katowice. These apartments are located on the top floors of the Sokolska Towers building and are a competitive alternative to penthouse apartments in the Silesian real estate market.

section_icons_01.header_bottom: ON THE HIGHEST FLOORS OF SOKOLSKA TOWERS

, in an area where thousands of new apartments will not be built, which you would have to compete with on price when selling your property on the secondary market.
Choose a corner apartment in a timeless building

info.paragraph: The decision to purchase real estate is one of the most important financial decisions of your life. Choose quality from a professional investor – purchase based on a VAT invoice with a full warranty on interior work.
A premium apartment requires premium service, handled from start to finish by your dedicated transaction manager, who will take care of the formalities for you.
If you own another property, it can serve as your down payment for a mortgage. Don’t let financial barriers stand in the way of investing in prestige.

elements.paragraph: Follow the trends in residential construction and invest in a property designed with modern technologies in mind.
